prog: (PARI) for(n=1,3000,x=sum(k=1,n, sigma(k)); if(issquare(x),print(x),))(PARI) { n=0; for (m=1, 10^5, x=sum(k=1, m, sigma(k)); if (issquare(x), write("b062407.txt", n++, " ", x); if (n==8, break)) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jul 08 2001
extensions: Terms a(7) and a(8) added by _Harry J. Smith_, Aug 07 2009
